column2: I carry night vision goggles for moments like this.
We cannot stop until the job is done!
Wow, I'm getting a good workout in today!
Dammit, we should've set up camp!
The likelihood of us surviving this trek is particularly low. We don't have the proper equipment to spot any gelatinous tangos.
Look at that gorgeous horizon, men!
Guess I'll just spray and pray, baby!
That's a stunning night sky, if ever I saw one!
